QuestData.Title: The Field Armorer
QuestData.Description: The Shado-Pan fight. As such, their armor often gets cut, scratched, torn, and burned. And it's my job to repair it.$b$bI'm no armorer, but I can repair a broken piece of mail as long as the hole's not too big.$b$bI prefer to use shell fragments from the tortoises that live in the wild fields to the northeast. Get some for me, and I can keep more Shado-Pan armored and alive.
QuestData.CompletionText: I refuse to let one of our kind fall just because of a broken set of armor.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. I'll get to repairing the armor tonight, once most everyone's returned.
